dct_title_s: The world, as known to the ancients
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Roman miles", "Greek stadia", "Persian parasangae", and "British miles".
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
